title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-4.4 - Disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-4.4 - Disclosure

State Regulations

No employee or agent of the Department who has knowledge of personal health-related information in the course of employment, shall disclose such information to any other person unless such person is officially authorized access to the information and requires the information to perform an officially designated function. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
